img_above_text:
![Wukong Pagoda 57.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/5d/Wukong_Pagoda_57.jpg)
Further up the cell tunnel, you may notice a Snake-Head Mushroom glowing blue... that can't be right. Try to harvest it, and you'll uncover an extremely strong Fungiman enemy.
img_below_text:
He's much stronger than any plant Guai you've encountered, and summons poison pools all around him. He can also shoot out several poison projectiles at you from all sides, and stab the ground repeatedly to cause poison explosions.
![Wukong Pagoda 58.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/0c/Wukong_Pagoda_58.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Pagoda 57.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/5d/Wukong_Pagoda_57.jpg)
Further up the cell tunnel, you may notice a Snake-Head Mushroom glowing blue... that can't be right. Try to harvest it, and you'll uncover an extremely strong Fungiman enemy."
        - Following Text: "He's much stronger than any plant Guai you've encountered, and summons poison pools all around him. He can also shoot out several poison projectiles at you from all sides, and stab the ground repeatedly to cause poison explosions.
![Wukong Pagoda 58.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/0c/Wukong_Pagoda_58.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a combat encounter in *Black Myth: Wukong*, where the protagonist faces a powerful Fungiman enemy in a dimly lit, reddish cave environment. The Fungiman emits poison clouds and appears to be surrounded by toxic effects, aligning with the preceding and following text that describe its ability to summon poison pools, launch poison projectiles, and cause poison explosions. The player character is positioned cautiously, ready for battle, with visible health and ability indicators on the screen.
